Text:
Sry, my 1st torrent.. noticed that the open.tpb tracker was totally dead so i removed the old torrent and added a few trackers. upon upping the updated torrent i was getting errors it already exists so i added an nfo file just for that reason.

sorry for any inconvenience caused.
enjoy & please seed! (my speed ain't the best and can't necessarily up 24/7.)

Heyz  ( don't know how else to contact with you than by doing a comment here ;) ) 
I've seen ya know quite allot about bioshock 2 ... and I was wondering if ya could help me out... I don't know how to connect with the product key .. assuming you know how to .. Plz help me

well i don't check this torrent that often (should get some more up btw), anyway, yeah, too bad there is no pm. but on such a public tracker it'd prob be spammed to hell so understandable. i answered to the KaOs torrent, so check there. if u're stuck again, let me now, maybe we can get on irc or sth.
